2025-06-30.content: Cloud HSM for Google Workspace now lets you use Cloud HSM keys for client-side encryption (CSE) to protect sensitive workloads in Google Workspace. For more information about Cloud HSM for Google Workspace, including how to get started, see [Onboard to Cloud HSM for Google Workspace](https://cloud.google.com/kms/docs/onboard-hsm-workspace).

summary.title: Cloud HSM for Google Workspace
summary.summary: You can now use Cloud HSM keys to protect sensitive data in Google Workspace with client-side encryption.
